ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""

need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""

sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var arr = baseUrl.split('/');
var songtype = arr[3];
var songid = arr[4].split('.')[0];
/*
var data = java.ajax("http://service.5sing.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?version=6.6.70&songid=" + songid + "&songtype=" + songtype);
data = JSON.parse(data).data
data.squrl || data.hqurl || data.lqurl;
*/
	
let params = {
  appid: 3146,
  clienttime: Math.ceil(Date.now() / 1000),
  clientver: 610850,
  dfid: "-",
  from: "com.sing.client.player",
  mid: 114514,
  songfields: "ID,SN,SK,SW,SS,ST,SI,CT,M,S,ZQ,WO,ZC,HY,YG,CK,D,RQ,DD,E,R,RC,SG,C,CS,LV,LG,SY,UID,PT,SCSR,SC,KM5",
  songid: songid,
  songtype: songtype,
  token: "",
  userfields: "ID,NN,I,YCRQ,FCRQ",
  uuid: "-"
}

let signstr = ""
let keys = Object.keys(params).sort()
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  signstr += `${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`
}
let signature = java.md5Encode("UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB" + signstr + "UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB")

let querys = []
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  querys.push(`${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`.replace(/\,/g, "%2c"))
}
let querystr = querys.join("&") + "&signature=" + signature
let request = java.ajax("https://5sapi.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?" + querystr)
// java.log(request)
let data = JSON.parse(request).data
data.squrl || data.squrl_backup || data.hqurl || data.hqurl_backup || data.lqurl || data.lqurl_backup
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
  function login() {
  	 const user = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("è´¦å·"))
    const pw = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç "))
    let sign = java.md5Encode(`isDevice=Android&password=${pw}&phone=${user}&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    let data = JSON.stringify({
      isDevice: "Android",
      password: pw,
      phone: user,
      regDevice: "2",
      sign: sign
    })
    let op = JSON.stringify({
      method: "POST",
      body: data
    })
    let res = java.ajax(`https://api.shaoniandream.com/Login/login,${op}`)
    let $ = JSON.parse(res)
    if($.status != 1) java.toast($.msg)
    java.put("uid",$.data.id)
    source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({
      logintoken: $.data.logintoken
    }))
  	}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let $ = JSON.parse(result)
  let uid = java.get("uid") != "undefined" ? java.get("uid") : "-1"
  let array = []
  $.data.chapterList.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({
    	 name: booklet.title,
    	 isv: true
    })
    booklet.chapterList.forEach((chapter) => {
    	 let sign = java.md5Encode(`BookID=${$.data.id}&UserID=${uid}&chapter_id=${chapter.id}&isDevice=Android&isMarket=true&regDevice=2&key=87ac02d392a8d3566fe7748c8de00af3&secrect=57dcuidu8aa8062bfe8042ea65310669`).toString().toUpperCase()
    	 let data = JSON.stringify({
    	   BookID: $.data.id,
    	   UserID: uid,
    	   chapter_id: chapter.id,
    	   isDevice: "Android",
    	   isMarket:"true",
    	   regDevice: "2",
    	   sign: sign
    	 })
      let op = JSON.stringify({
        method: "POST",
        body: data
      })
      array.push({
        name: chapter.title,
        url: "https://api.shaoniandream.com/Booklibrary/readchapter," + op,
        time: java.timeFormat(chapter.release_time_now * 1000),
        vip: chapter.isFree == 1,
        buy: chapter.lock == 1
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#content label")
txt=java.getElement("#content [class=001] p")

	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#content form")

<js>
const sign_key = "d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1";
const action = "https://api-ks.wenxueapp.com/api/v1/chapter/chapter-list?";
var book_id = {{$.id}};

params = {
    "id": book_id
};

var urlEncode = function(param, key, encode) {
    if (param == null) return "";
    var paramStr = "";
    var t = typeof(param);
    if (t == "string" || t == "number" || t == "boolean") {
        paramStr += "&" + key + "=" + ((encode == null || encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
    } else {
        for (var i in param) {
            var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? "[" + i + "]" : "." + i);
            paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
        }
    }
    return paramStr;
};

var paramSign = String(java.md5Encode(
    Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre, n) => pre + n + "=" + params[n], "") + sign_key
));

params["sign"] = paramSign;

var cheaper_url = action + urlEncode(params) + "," + java.get("headers")

cheaper_url
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImporter = new JavaImporter();
javaImporter.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util
);
with (javaImporter) {
    function decode(content) {
        var ivEncryptedData = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
        var secretKey = SecretKeySpec(String("242ccb8230d709e1").getBytes(), "AES");
        var ivParameter = IvParameterSpec(Arrays.copyOfRange(ivEncryptedData, 0, 16));
        var cipher = Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        cipher.init(2, secretKey, ivParameter);
        return String(cipher.doFinal(Arrays.copyOfRange(ivEncryptedData, 16, ivEncryptedData.length)));
    }
}

const signKey = "d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1";

var params = {
    "id": String(java.get("bid")),
    "chapterId": String(baseUrl.split("/").pop())
};

var urlEncode = function(param, key, encode) {
    if (param == null) return "";
    var paramStr = "";
    var paramType = typeof param;
    if (paramType == "string" || paramType == "number" || paramType == "boolean") {
        paramStr += "&" + key + "=" + ((encode == null || encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
    } else {
        for (var keyName in param) {
            var newKey = key == null ? keyName : key + (param instanceof Array ? "[" + keyName + "]" : "." + keyName);
            paramStr += urlEncode(param[keyName], newKey, encode);
        }
    }
    return paramStr;
};

paramSign = String(java.md5Encode(
    Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((accumulator, current) => accumulator + current + "=" + params[current], "") + signKey
));
params["sign"] = paramSign;
requestUrl = "https://api-ks.wenxueapp.com/api/v1/chapter/content?" + urlEncode(params);
decode(JSON.parse(java.ajax(requestUrl + "," + java.get("headers"))).data.content)
</js>

    if (param == null) return "";
    var paramStr = "";
    var t = typeof(param);
    if (t == "string" || t == "number" || t == "boolean") {
        paramStr += "&" + key + "=" + ((encode == null || encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
    } else {
        for (var i in param) {
            var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? "[" + i + "]" : "." + i);
            paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
        }
    }
    return paramStr;
};

var paramSign = String(java.md5Encode(
    Object.keys(params).sort().reduce(
        (pre, n) => pre + n + "=" + params[n], ""
    ) + sign_key
));

var book_url = action + urlEncode(params) + "," + java.get("headers")

book_url
</js>

    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
